login.description: Web3 will not build itself. Go and add your block.
login.title: Log in to Apillon

onboarding.buildCustomApp: Build a custom app with all the necessary blockchain-based services for your use case.
onboarding.buildWeb3: “Build versatile and high-performing Web3 solutions with Apillon. Harness the power of blockchain technology and create next-gen dapps through simple yet robust APIs”
onboarding.loader: Put your Web3 hat on, your dashboard is getting ready.
onboarding.walkThroughWeb3: Walk through a fully Web3-compatible website demo, test a few services and check open-source code.
onboarding.web3ProjectName: Your  Web3 project needs a name

signup.description: Build your first Web3 application with Apillon. Deploy, monitor, and scale with our fully managed blockchain-based back-end service.
signup.emailSent:
We just sent an email containing a link to {email}. 
 Click on it to activate your account.
signup.enterDesiredPassword: Enter a password to finish creating the account.

emailConfiguration.emailText: End users will be able to sign up using email and password. A Digital ID (DID) will be created for them through KILT Protocol.
emailConfiguration.didText: DIDs generated by the KILT protocol will be saved to Apillon DID Vault and become available for quick login for end-users.

terms.project: I understand that the Apillon Closed Beta delivers no guarantees related to functionalities or access and is intended for testing purposes only. Beta features also come with several limitations, which will be removed with each platform update as more and more users deliver feedback on Closed Beta and help improve the platform's services.
terms.payment: I understand the billing process and some other legal stuff.

domain.editDisabled: Website domain can be changed every 15 minutes.

hosting.clearAllFiles: Do you want to remove all files?
hosting.clearAllWarn: With this action you will erase all files. To deploy new version to preview, you will have to upload whole website.

collection.emptyInfo: Add it to your Web3 project
collection.name: Collection name
collection.title: Collection title
collection.uploadYourFirst: Upload your first NFTs and start building your collection.
collection.view: Or, display them on your existing website

created.info:
To display your NFTs and mint them, you need a website. 
Use the Apillon NFT website template and host it on a decentralized network.
created.or: or see its contents in your
created.title: Display your NFTs on the internet

labelInfo.collectionBaseUri: Paste the collection metadata base URI here.
labelInfo.collectionChain: Select the network where your NFTs will be deployed
labelInfo.collectionDropStart: A date when your NFT collection becomes publicly available for visitors to buy NFTs.
labelInfo.collectionIsDrop: With drop, your collection becomes accessible for visitors to buy NFTs from a certain date onwards.
labelInfo.collectionMaxSupply: The specified number serves as a max supply. Once set, you won't be able to add more files than specified to the collection.
labelInfo.collectionName: The name you choose will be the official name of your NFT collection, “name” NFT collection.
labelInfo.collectionReserve: A number of NFT you wish to reserve for yourself before the drop.
labelInfo.collectionRevocable: Collection owner can destroy NFT(s) at any point in time.
labelInfo.collectionRoyaltiesAddress: It’s the address to receive optional royalties in case NFT gets sold further.
labelInfo.collectionRoyaltiesFees: The % value of royalties you want to collect in the future NFT sales.
labelInfo.collectionSoulbound: Soulbound NFTs are not tradeable, they cannot leave the wallet they were deposited into.
labelInfo.collectionSupplyLimited: If limited, please specify the actual number of the NFTs in total supply on the right.
labelInfo.collectionSymbol: A symbol acts as a token name on the blockchain for this NFT collection. It consists of 3 or 4 letters, in connection to the name of the NFT collection.

metadata.infoBucket: Apillon will now create a new Web3 storage bucket where you will be able to upload all your NFT files.
metadata.infoBucketCreation: Apillon is creating a new Web3 storage bucket where the NFT files will go.
metadata.infoBucketCreated: You will now be able to upload your NFT metadata and NFT images to it.
metadata.infoCollectionBehaviour: Configure the behaviour of your NFT collection.
metadata.infoCollectionName: Define the name and symbol for your NFT collection.
metadata.infoNew:
To ensure permanent access to your NFTs, you need to store their metadata and files on the web. 

Would you like to store your NFT metadata in decentralized way?
metadata.title: Prepare NFT metadata

upload.infoFile: This is the first step to your NFT collection. The file names in the CSV record should match the names of NFT files you upload in the next step.
upload.infoImages: Now, upload NFT files for your NFT collection, images or other media. File names should match those in the CSV metadata record from the previous step.

banner.title: Apillon Referral program
banner.description: Are you a true Web3 believer and want to build the future together with your friends? Share the news, invite your friends and collect points!

enter.description: Currently we are working with a limited list of countries so the reward shipments can be carried out. Please select your country in the list below.
enter.btn: Let's see if we can work together

referral.content: Welcome to Apillon referral program. While we are working hard on first MVP and giving you access to beta test, you are free to invite other developers to Apillon, collect points and get your Apillon Merch pack 1.0.
referral.subtitle: Get your Apillon Merch pack 1.0 by helping with referral.
referral.title: Referral program

instructions.second: 2. Choose a desired reward and claim it, spending your points
instructions.third: 3. If you collect more points than you can spend, dont worry, the points are transferred to the next reward cycle

shirt.info: Web3 instant Fashion. Show others you are a dev and Web3 supporter.

referral.rewardsSize: Choose the desired size. In case the size is not available we will send you whatever we have left.
referral.invite: Invite your developer friends and score
referral.linkDesc: Share the link below before they register to set the referral progress. Once they confirm their GitHub accounts, you will earn 2 points per each active referral.

referres.info: Keep track of the referral links, active connections and points earned.

bucket.new: Each file hosting that passes through Crust's pinning and replication service is paid up front for a minimum period of 6 months. Apillon has no control over amending that period, so keep in mind that all files you deploy to Apillon storage buckets will remain accessible for that period of time.
bucket.delete: All items stored in this bucket will be permanently deleted after 3 months. Until then you can find them in the deleted items tab and you can restore them anytime before.

file.delete: This item will be permanently deleted after 3 months. Until then you can find them in the deleted items tab and you can restore them anytime before.

folder.delete: All items stored in this directory will be permanently deleted after 3 months. Until then you can find them in the deleted items tab and you can restore them anytime before.

nft.new: Your NFT collection is now configured. If you proceed with this step, the deployment of NFT collection on blockchain will start. Once deployed, the NFTs will be live on the blockchain and ready to mingle with the world.
